video.title: Heroes
video.synopsis: This groundbreaking sci-fi drama intertwines the stories of a disparate group of people who suddenly discover they possess superhuman abilities.

episodes.synopsis: A genetics professor continues his father's secret research: finding people whose extraordinary powers may represent the next step in human evolution.
episodes.title: Genesis

episodes.synopsis: Los Angeles cop Matt realizes he can hear people's thoughts, while Texas cheerleader Claire almost exposes her own power.
episodes.title: Don't Look Back

episodes.synopsis: Claire's ability is tested when a romantic encounter gets violent. As Matt hunts for a serial killer, Hiro must convince a friend about their destiny.
episodes.title: One Giant Leap

episodes.synopsis: Suresh tracks down one of the "heroes." Hiro uses his ability to cheat in Las Vegas, while Nathan visits a powerful donor to raise campaign money.
episodes.title: Collision

episodes.synopsis: Claire tells her dad her secret, and he has secrets of his own. Peter gets a message from a stranger, and Suresh plans to abandon his father's work.
episodes.title: Hiros

episodes.synopsis: Peter shares the cryptic message with Hiro, who realizes he must "save the cheerleader." Niki wonders how D.L. escaped from jail.
episodes.title: Better Halves

episodes.synopsis: Matt teams with FBI agent Audrey to find the mysterious Sylar. Instead, they find a new hero. Niki is distraught after D.L. kidnaps their son Micah.
episodes.title: Nothing to Hide

episodes.synopsis: Suresh returns to India to mourn his father but his troubling dreams make him reconsider his quest for the heroes. Claire prepares for homecoming.
episodes.title: Seven Minutes to Midnight

episodes.synopsis: Sylar's arrival causes terror at the homecoming dance. Hiro travels back in time to save his new friend. Micah and D.L. reveal special abilities.
episodes.title: Homecoming

episodes.synopsis: In a peek at the past, Suresh's dad goes to New York to see if the heroes do exist, while Claire joins the cheerleading squad and discovers her power.
episodes.title: Six Months Ago

episodes.synopsis: The tragedy in Texas takes a toll on many of the heroes; more information comes to light regarding the nuclear bombing foretold by Isaac's painting.
episodes.title: Fallout

episodes.synopsis: Nathan asks Simone for help with a comatose Peter; Hiro hunts for the samurai sword in Isaac's painting; police question Niki; and a new hero appears.
episodes.title: Godsend

episodes.synopsis: Peter meets a man who may help him control his powers; Nathan and Suresh search for Peter; in their quest for the sword, Hiro and Ando are abducted.
episodes.title: The Fix

episodes.synopsis: Hiro tries to explain his new life to his business mogul father and high-powered sister, and Niki struggles to reunite with D.L. and Micah.
episodes.title: Distractions

episodes.synopsis: Claire's adoptive mother deals with scandal when the truth about Claire's birth father comes to light. Suresh finds someone on the list.
episodes.title: Run!

episodes.synopsis: Peter uncovers a betrayal; Hiro faces a tough decision; Claire's anger at her father boils over; and Matt deals with Ted Sprague and a new hero.
episodes.title: Unexpected

episodes.synopsis: Matt and Ted Sprague arrive in Texas and take H.R.G. and his family hostage, forcing a face-off that reveals secrets and H.R.G.'s inscrutable past.
episodes.title: Company Man

episodes.synopsis: On election eve, Nathan finally meets Linderman face-to-face; Hiro tries to steal the sword and faces harsh repercussions; and a new hero turns up.
episodes.title: Parasite

episodes.synopsis: Sylar confronts two more heroes; Nathan reflects on Linderman's advice as he faces thorny choices that will affect his loved ones and all of humanity.
When Hiro and Ando are thrust five years into the future, they encounter a world where heroes are considered terrorists.
episodes.title: Five Years Gone

episodes.synopsis: Hiro and Ando face the challenge of saving the world with increased resolve, and Nathan does everything he can to ensure he'll win the election.
episodes.title: The Hard Part

episodes.synopsis: Congressman-elect Nathan reflects on the costs and benefits. Hiro gets important family information as he prepares to face off against Sylar.
episodes.title: Landslide

episodes.synopsis: As Isaac's horrific painted predictions begin coming true, the heroes gather at New York City's Kirby Plaza and face their worst nightmares.
episodes.title: How to Stop an Exploding Man

episodes.synopsis: The outcome of Nathan, Peter and Matt's showdown with Sylar is revealed, and the Bennets try to lead an ordinary existence in California.
episodes.title: Four Months Later

episodes.synopsis: Investigating Kaito Nakamura's assassination, Matt finds a link to the Petrelli family, and Noah reveals that an Isaac painting predicted the murder.
episodes.title: Lizards

episodes.synopsis: West reveals that Claire's not the only one in her new town with powers. Suresh returns from abroad and finds another troubling painting by Isaac.
episodes.title: Kindred

episodes.synopsis: Parkman uncovers a disturbing link to the man in Molly's nightmares. Maya and Alejandro cross paths with Sylar. An incident awakens Monica's powers.
episodes.title: The Kindness of Strangers

episodes.synopsis: When Molly's condition worsens, Mohinder's forced to make a difficult decision, while Parkman and Nathan track down the man who haunts her dreams.
episodes.title: Fight or Flight

episodes.synopsis: Claire hatches a revenge plot against the cheerleading squad leader. HRG's search for the last of Isaac's paintings leads him down a precarious path.
episodes.title: The Line

episodes.synopsis: Matt gets help from familiar faces to fight the "Nightmare Man," while Peter and Caitlin learn about the devastation of the Shanti virus.
episodes.title: Out of Time

episodes.synopsis: Time turns back four months to reveal the heavy toll incurred by Nathan, D.L. and the others following their showdown with Sylar.
episodes.title: Four Months Ago

episodes.synopsis: As the Company closes in, Noah plans to uproot his family, but Claire is resolved to stay behind with West. And Suresh gains a surprising new partner.
episodes.title: Cautionary Tales

episodes.synopsis: Peter is on a mission to destroy the deadly Shanti virus; Hiro hunts for his father's killer; and Claire deals with a tragic death in her family.
episodes.title: Truth & Consequences

episodes.synopsis: Friends become foes as Adam, in a bid to get his hands on the Shanti virus, manipulates Peter into turning on his former allies.
episodes.title: Powerless

episodes.synopsis: Minutes after Nathan's shooting, a revelation about the gunman's identity forces Peter and Matt to come to terms with a stark new reality.
episodes.title: The Second Coming

episodes.synopsis: Sylar attacks the Company's headquarters and discovers Level 5, where the most violent offenders are kept under observation.
episodes.title: The Butterfly Effect

episodes.synopsis: Angela sends in HRG and his powerful new partner to defuse the situation when a group of villains take hostages at a bank.
episodes.title: One of Us, One of Them

episodes.synopsis: Peter tries to prevent his vision of an apocalyptic future from coming to pass by making use of a dangerous new ability.
episodes.title: I Am Become Death

episodes.synopsis: Claire closes in on her first target, an escaped Level 5 prisoner named Stephen Canfield, who can produce black holes.
episodes.title: Angels and Monsters

episodes.synopsis: Knox and Daphne try to lure Hiro and some of the others to Pinehearst. When Peter visits the rival company, he's shocked by what he finds.
episodes.title: Dying of the Light

episodes.synopsis: Trapped by an increasingly dangerous Suresh, Nathan and Tracy struggle to free themselves from the mutant doctor's deadly grip.
episodes.title: Eris Quod Sum

episodes.synopsis: Sylar feels guilty about his murderous deeds, but Elle and HRG stand in the way of his redemption.
episodes.title: Villains

episodes.synopsis: Nathan learns that his father is alive -- and trying to destroy the world -- and Arthur orders Knox and Flint to round up Peter and Claire.
episodes.title: It's Coming

episodes.synopsis: Nathan and Peter head to Haiti to find the one man who can put a stop to their father's evil plot.
episodes.title: The Eclipse: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: As the eclipse continues to affect the heroes' powers, Noah faces off against Elle and Sylar.
episodes.title: The Eclipse: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Peter and the Haitian attempt to defeat Arthur once and for all, but Sylar gets in the way.
episodes.title: Our Father

episodes.synopsis: After teaming up against their father, Peter and Nathan face off against each other -- with dramatic consequences.
episodes.title: Dual

episodes.synopsis: The heroes set out to make a fresh start, but Claire's efforts are cut short when she learns that Nathan is up to no good again.
episodes.title: A Clear and Present Danger

episodes.synopsis: With Nathan and his agents on the hunt for people with powers, the heroes are forced to flee.
episodes.title: Trust and Blood

episodes.synopsis: Sylar and Luke set out on a road trip in search of Sylar's father, with Nathan's agents hot on their trail.
episodes.title: Building 26

episodes.synopsis: Knocked out by a spiked drink, Noah is captured and held hostage by the heroes.
episodes.title: Cold Wars

episodes.synopsis: A tip from Rebel sends Matt and Peter racing to Building 26 to save Daphne and snag documents that detail the government's plans.
episodes.title: Exposed

episodes.synopsis: Sylar's quest to find his father finally comes to a close, and Hunter plots to expose the Petrelli family secrets and take over Nathan's operation.
episodes.title: Shades of Gray

episodes.synopsis: Noah and Danko discuss letting Tracy go, thinking she might lead them right to Rebel. Angela seeks the help of an old friend.
episodes.title: Cold Snap

episodes.synopsis: Once Nathan's ability is revealed, he and Claire seek refuge in Mexico, and Danko teams up with a highly unlikely partner.
episodes.title: Into Asylum

episodes.synopsis: As Danko's war against the superhumans kicks into high gear, his relentlessness puts someone close to him in harm's way.
episodes.title: Turn and Face the Strange

episodes.synopsis: Angela dredges up a fount of repressed memories with help from her sons, and Mohinder stumbles upon long-lost secrets in his late father's history.
As Hiro and Ando plot to take down Building 26, Nathan works to undo the damage caused by his scheme.
episodes.title: I Am Sylar

episodes.synopsis: Nathan struggles to stop Sylar from meeting the president and setting off a catastrophic chain of events.
episodes.title: An Invisible Thread

episodes.synopsis: This Season 4 debut introduces a mysterious carnival clan whose intentions are unknown, while familiar faces adjust to new stages of their lives.
episodes.title: Orientation/Jump, Push, Fall

episodes.synopsis: As Hiro's life continues to hang in the balance, he distracts himself by saving the lives of others.
episodes.title: Ink

episodes.synopsis: Hiro's health continues to deteriorate. Angela takes a gamble by helping the new Nathan regain his memory.
episodes.title: Acceptance

episodes.synopsis: Self-discovery rocks their world as our Heroes encounter new abilities, try to recall past lives, and stumble upon an unexpected kiss.
episodes.title: Hysterical Blindness

episodes.synopsis: Under Samuel's guidance, Sylar starts on a path to rediscover his true identity.
episodes.title: Tabula Rasa

episodes.synopsis: Matt goes to extreme measures to extinguish Sylar, who continues to torment him.
episodes.title: Strange Attractors

episodes.synopsis: When Hiro travels three years into the past, he has a second chance to save Charlie from the hands of Sylar.
episodes.title: Once Upon a Time in Texas

episodes.synopsis: Claire is determined to get to the bottom of the Sorority Rush attacks on her own, and Peter's new ability is a perfect fit for his job.
episodes.title: Shadowboxing

episodes.synopsis: Samuel learns just how powerful he can become and takes dangerous measures to reach his full potential.
episodes.title: Brother's Keeper

episodes.synopsis: Thanksgiving unites families and brings new revelations, as HRG hosts an untraditional holiday dinner.
episodes.title: Thanksgiving

episodes.synopsis: Samuel starts to see his vision take shape, HRG is greeted by some unexpected visitors, and Samuel's grand plan begins to come to fruition.
episodes.title: The Fifth Stage

episodes.synopsis: As Claire becomes immersed in the world of the Carnival, she becomes increasingly suspicious of Samuel's motives.
episodes.title: Upon This Rock

episodes.synopsis: Sylar returns to the Carnival in search of answers, and Peter continues to struggle with the loss of his brother.
episodes.title: Let It Bleed

episodes.synopsis: HRG recruits Matt to help him take down Samuel, and they use his long-lost love, Vanessa, to lure him to them.
episodes.title: Close to You

episodes.synopsis: Hiro's life hangs in the balance as his brain tumor worsens, prompting him to subconsciously deal with some of his past decisions.
episodes.title: Pass/Fail

episodes.synopsis: HRG enacts his plan to take down the Carnival with the help of Lauren and Suresh.
episodes.title: The Art of Deception

episodes.synopsis: Fueled by his vision of Emma in grave danger, Peter attempts to rescue Sylar from his worst nightmare.
episodes.title: The Wall

episodes.synopsis: Everyone bands together in an effort to stop Samuel from taking the lives of thousands. Meanwhile, Claire and HRG find themselves trapped underground.
episodes.title: Brave New World
